139.heading: Mayors.
139.title: "La Mort Lente"
139.author: [No author]
139.series: Janus Stark) p. 80-119 in Cap'tain Swing, no. 122
notes: Summary: Stark is an escape artist in 19th century London, whose powers of escape are supernatural. In this episode a Professor Abel Witherspoon takes Stark on a trip to the future in a time machine, and a man named Ranulf Craske tries to become mayor of London by killing the current mayor at a Christmas banquet. Stark is then asked to go into a cave to rescue a man named Guy Trafford. From the content it appears that these were originally three separate episodes.
